name: Proof_354 — Morning Temperature Before Daily Work MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents the morning environmental condition at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
19 December 2025 at 07:31 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows a digital thermometer and humidity meter displaying ambient temperature and humidity levels before the start of daily farm work. This measurement is taken as part of MaMeeFarm’s routine environmental monitoring to establish baseline conditions for the day.

Recording temperature and humidity prior to labor activities provides critical ground-truth context for farm operations, animal care, and human working conditions.

This record is captured as-is, without staging, adjustment, or enhancement, in accordance with DGCP principles of transparency, continuity, and real-world evidence.
The embedded timestamp in the image ensures verifiable temporal traceability.

This proof is part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection and is distributed via IPFS (ipfs.io) for long-term auditability and integrity.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
